text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nde mba Fhe Bakɨme nden kamgim, nde ndavi domdorgiap, guigira Zisas khothɨgi, nde mba tuge ndɨkndɨgɨri. Nde vhɨrve, nde kha nuiana gumgi rɨmgi nɨman, nde ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Nde vhɨrve, nde zɨri bakɨvi ki fhuvara. Nde vhɨra, nde vhɨrve, nde zɨri ki fhuv ndegi gu ndegmbori nde tegi.
